    • onPlayerStateChange

      void onPlayerStateChange(Player player)
      Player implementations should call this method ideally each time the player state changes, or at least when these changes are happening: - on starting/resuming playing or stopping/pausing - on being muted or unmuted
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose state just changed
